data.meanings: to get night, arrive suddenly, approach, draw near.
data.sentence: The word أَزِفَتِ comes from the root ا ز ف and is associated with the meanings: to get night, arrive suddenly, approach, draw near.

data.meanings: to get night, arrive suddenly, approach, draw near.
data.sentence: The word الْءَازِفَةُ comes from the root ا ز ف and is associated with the meanings: to get night, arrive suddenly, approach, draw near.
